sentences.sContent: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.sCn: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.sContent: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.sCn: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.sContent: ...it is important to find out some ways to solve the problem...
...If nothing else showing that you've tried to solve the problem yourself before you take it further...
...he insisted it would solve three problems at once : feed the hungry masses...
...and technology--to solve the problems of the future...
...solve problems and acquire fascinating facts about the exciting world in which they live.26 Why do some children trapped in a burning building hide from masked fire fighters...
...Yet it is proposed that some measures should be taken to solve the potential problems caused by it...
...The inconvenient truth is that if we don't solve the engineering problem...
...They try to find ways to help solve the problems that contribute to crime in the first place...

words.tran: 有偿付能力的；有溶解力的
可以解决的；可以解的；可溶的
解决方案；溶液；溶解；解答
解决者；[计] 解算机；[数] 求解程序
[化学] 溶解；[化学] 溶剂化作用；溶化
[数] 可解性；解决之可能性；溶解度

trans.tranOther: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem
